page.title: 13Employment in Bramley area.
page.content: { The Silverwood Colliery coal mine}is one square km. in size and very important to our district. About{90% of the population of Sunnyside work there. In Silverwood Colliery there are drinks facilities and elevators.In Silverwood Colliery they have computers and printers to go with it.They use conveyer computers. { Hellaby Industrial Estate}employs a large percentage of the population from Hellaby. The rest of the people that work in the area are the school teachers, and shop and garage workers. There are five schools in our area all of which have a caretaker and cleaning staff, as well as kitchen workers and ancillary workers. In our area as a whole{unemployment is increasing_ around 25% of Dads have no job. About 40% of Mums work.
